oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Wayland Patton and Karen Staley - 2004-07-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances by songwriters Wayland Patton and Karen Staley from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 10, 2004
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wayland Patton; Karen Staley;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Includes questions from audience. Recording begins in process. Performances include; Turn It On, Turn It Up, Turn Me Loose - excerpt (Wayland Patton) -- A Night Like This (Karen Staley) -- Something In My Heart (Wayland Patton) -- Take Me As I Am (Karen Staley) -- Unidentified song likely titled It's Good To Know Who Your Real Friends Are (Wayland Patton) -- Puppy's Still A Dog Just The Same (Karen Staley) -- Land Of The Living (Wayland Patton) -- The Keeper Of The Stars (Karen Staley).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Patton, Wayland; Staley, Karen; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
